name: RAPL_XS_FUNC_CHK_PKG_ENERGY_STATUS_MSR
summary: Check whether PKG Domain RAPL ENERGY STATUS MSR 0x611 is enabled or not, which is the prerequisite of loading intel_rapl driver,  if the value is non-zero means PKG Domain ENERGY STATUS is enabled, otherwise it's not enabled, perform this case in pre-silicon and Power On platform to check RAPL ENERGY STATUS MSR level enabling status in simics and HW/FW.
